t: Horizon Global More Than Triples On Merger Deal With First Brands
s: January 3, 2023 - First Brands will acquire Horizon Global for $1.75 per share in an all-cash deal. The transaction represents a 31% premium to the trading price before the strategic alternative announcement in August 2022, and over 350% premium to the last closing price of $0.3888.
